strings: <se_def>*: Sorry about before. I was convinced you were with Dhoulmagus, you see.

<se_def>*: I'm not at liberty to disclose the details,
but we came here to the Dark Ruins in pursuit of Dhoulmagus.
<se_def>*: We were chasing after Dhoulmagus and we ended up here.

<se_def>*: Why were we chasing him?
Hmm, good question!
Well, it's like this...
<se_def>*: We're here to avenge the death of our beloved Mr. Golding, owner of the famous Baccarat casino!

<se_high>*: You fool! That's supposed to be top secret!
No one's supposed to know that he's gone!
<se_def>*: Oh yes! Oh no! Listen to me blabbing away!

<se_def>*: By the Goddess!
All you had to do was keep your mouth shut!

<se_def>*: Never mind. What's done is done.
We may as well tell you everything now.
Ask away!
